Reviews.Content: stayed nights hotel doria happy stay downside size shower somewhat usual european hotels sort expected laugh husband squeeze tiny shower mention tiny elevator fil skinny people person luggage actually giggle unique overlook enjoy stay quaint hotel close termini station 10minute walk colosseum palatine staff helpful polite nearby restaraunts dinner expensive overall stay rome hotel doria

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel doria 3 nights february chose hotel proximity termini station amount reviews received tripadvisor disappointed hotels ive stayed european city especially price paid minute arrived minute left welcoming friendly cosy reception staff encountered cheerful extremely helpful offering advice eat etc knowledgeable providing information city time day questions spacious clean tastefully decorated comfortable bed overall facilties slight complaint bathrooms cramped major overlooking street loved buzz city window easily disturbed dont lot traffic noise suggest requesting hotel continental breakfast offer delicious variety choose lady looked breakfast friendly hard breakfast 6th floor outdoor terrace overlooking city wasnt officially winter sit 2 mornings pleasant imagine beautiful eating breakfast summer morning location hotel 5 mins walk termini handy shuttle coaches train services rome airports colosseum 10 min walk nice park historic centre 1520 min walk hotels lot closer historic attractions advice friendly priced quality decent hotel look enjoyed minute time rome stay doria excellent

Reviews.Content: trip 10th 14th february 2012 cosy hotel centre rome 5 minutes walk main train station 10 15 minutes walk key attractions staff friendly helpful visit directions time rome visited snow 26 unusual city hotel warm

Reviews.Content: stayed night rome break 30th november 2011 3rd december 2011 location hotel close station close closer little rough street via merulana leads straight santa maria maggiore streets coming restaurants cafes nice little irish pub drank staff hotel friendly helpful checking spoke english expecting exceptionally based reviews standard size minibar cheap charged uk tv english channels bathroom shower spotlessly clean breakfast nice fancy winter roof terrace sit breakfast unlocked look colosseum distance nice hotel clean friendly rome budget definitely stay

Reviews.Content: overnighted rome arriving train naples hotel easy 10 minutes walk railway station read previous reviews saying recommend hotel street noisy window quiet closed air conditioning excellent noise bed comfortable experienced 6 weeks pillow soft staff extremely helpful gentleman suggested tourist restaurant nearby rang booked table excellent choice called lovely food atmosphere breakfast fine little bit cooler enjoyed eating rooftop terrace

Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights hotel doria husband adult son clean comfortable street 1st night noisy rest stay fine service throughout stay cleanliness outstanding breakfast fine boring stay mini bar value money 2 cheap round corner lots eating 510 mins walk bad size lift building reviewers loved roof top terrace evenings location seeing sights metro reach vatican

Reviews.Title: “do not get a room facing the road!”
Reviews.Author: MrsRMA
Reviews.Content: hotel friendly clean size except bathroom shower tiny im person dont listening incessant roar traffic busy main road facing building change sleep windows closed extremely stuffy hot weather warmed hotel refused aircon stating allowed government ruling april 15th doubt top hotels theirs guests paying lots try location hotel quieter

Reviews.Title: “Great value and excellent service”
Reviews.Author: BournemouthPlusone
Reviews.Content: doria value threestar hotel convenient location close station walking distance romes main sights staff incredibly friendly helpful standard price hotel situated busy main road location little noisy shutters triple glazing mean noise street substantially reduced lovely friendly hotel thats perfect cheap cheerful visit eternal city

Reviews.Content: faulty towers funny funny staff except glasses nice bring friend desk wouldnt pay front late 230 am time holidays door saying paying 24 hours allowed liked 2 cleaning staff racket day 12noon please disturb notice door knocking door morning look toilet paper 3rd daythere half roll arrived 3 wasnt hot water shower occasion tried smell sewage

Reviews.Title: “Quiet, Transportation-friendly, Adequate Hotel”
Reviews.Author: lsg5021
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel doria seven nights trip rome college graduation trip friend sights explore nightlife quickly realized typical guests hotel returned 2am night ours keys left front desk hotel definitely inn feel suited couples separate following list pros cons depends own preferences convenient termini station couple blocks feel comfortable public transportation quiet neighborhood school key system opposed cards breakfast adequate friendly staff speak english elevator stairs housekeeping leaves midday overall decent hotel neither impressed nor disappointed

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant!”

Reviews.Content: seen lots positive reviews hotel hotel location 510 minute walk coloseum 5 minute walk termini train station shared cab couple 45 euros leonardo express goes platform 25 half hour 11 euros remember validate ticket little yellow boxes platform wise charge 30 mins airport highly reccomend hotel lovely clean towels etc everyday kettle surrounded coffee shops breakfast nice lots pastries cereal etc view breaky rome reception 24 hrs day left keys whenever overall lovely trip hotel location planning return visit
